long_description: Zonas fabric tape adheres easily to skin to hold gauze or bandages in place. It also works as support strapping for wounds requiring immobilization. Easily torn as needed in two directions. Ideal for replenishing your medicine cabinet or first aid kit. Measures 1" wide x 30 feet long.
short_description: Zonas fabric tape adheres easily to skin to hold gauze or bandages in place. It also works as support strapping for wounds requiring immobilization.
